Class NCG2NMG

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, Conversion<Game,Game>
public class NCG2NMG
extends Game2NMG

This class provides a conversion from NCG to equivalent NMG.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
